name: Classic Sneakers
description: Comfortable and stylish sneakers for everyday wear.
longDescription: These classic sneakers are designed for both comfort and style. Perfect for everyday wear, they feature a durable sole and breathable material to keep your feet comfortable all day long.

name: Durable Boots
description: Rugged boots built for tough environments.
longDescription: Built to withstand the toughest environments, these durable boots offer superior protection and comfort. Ideal for hiking, work, or any outdoor activity.

name: Minimal Sandals
description: Light and breezy sandals for a casual day out.
longDescription: Enjoy a casual day out with these minimal sandals. Lightweight and breezy, they provide the perfect balance of comfort and style for warm weather.

name: Stylish Loafers
description: Perfect loafers for formal and semi-formal occasions.
longDescription: These stylish loafers are perfect for both formal and semi-formal occasions. Crafted with high-quality materials, they offer a sleek look and comfortable fit.

name: Elegant High Heels
description: Chic high heels to elevate your outfit.
longDescription: Elevate your outfit with these elegant high heels. Chic and sophisticated, they are designed to provide both style and comfort for any special occasion.

name: Comfortable Slippers
description: Soft and cozy slippers for lounging at home.
longDescription: Lounge at home in comfort with these soft and cozy slippers. Made with plush materials, they offer warmth and relaxation for your feet.

name: Casual Flip Flops
description: Relaxed flip flops perfect for the beach or pool.
longDescription: Perfect for the beach or pool, these casual flip flops offer a relaxed fit and durable design. Enjoy the sun and water with these comfortable sandals.

name: Vintage Clogs
description: Retro-inspired clogs for a unique look.
longDescription: Add a unique touch to your outfit with these vintage clogs. Retro-inspired and stylish, they provide a comfortable fit and distinctive look.

name: Moccasin Shoes
longDescription: Experience everyday comfort with these casual moccasin shoes. Designed for a relaxed fit, they are perfect for any casual occasion.

name: Formal Oxfords
description: Polished oxfords ideal for professional settings.
longDescription: These polished oxfords are ideal for professional settings. They offer a sleek and sophisticated look, perfect for any formal occasion.
